page.title: 13Woburn Lifestyle 5
page.content: {Clubs and Societies. {Guides}are important in Woburn as the vicar's wife is the District Commissioner. The local company meets in the Church on Monday evenings. The{Youth Club}meets in the Town Hall on Tuesday. It caters for the 9 to 16 year olds. Darts, snooker, pool and table tennis are popular and a record player provides music. The{Play Group} meets in the crypt of the Church and caters for the 2 to 4 year olds. {Carers}is a society for those looking after elderly relatives and provides these people with a contact point. As there are a large number of elderly in the village, this group is popular.{ {The swimming pool}is a heated outdoor pool open from 1 pm to 7pm every day from 1st June to 31st August. It is very popular with all ages.
